'''Dr. Domner''' is a surgeon who operated on [[Bob Seibert]].

==History==
After Bob Seibert was injured in a car accident, he needed surgery. Dr. Domner operated, but he quickly discovered that Bob's extensive liver damage meant he wouldn't survive the surgery without a transplant. When Bob's son, Scott, agreed to donate, Dr. Domner transplanted the liver and finished Bob's surgery.

==Career==
Dr. Domner is a general surgeon at [[Seattle Grace Hospital]].

==Notes and Trivia==
*In the original script, his name was Dr. Donner.
